FuncDef: This command assigns an existing flow count limit policer as an action on flows matching this AQP entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the existing flow setup rate policer for this application assurance profile. The policer-name is configured in the config>app-assure>group>policer context.
Specifies the name of the event log used when event logging is enabled, up to 32 characters, which is used when event logging is enabled.
